title: SCP Auction Lot 190- Walter Johnson pieces
author: timn1

posts.post_title: SCP Auction Lot 190- Walter Johnson pieces
posts.post_content:
I apologize for putting this all over the BST but there is something in all four prewar-II categories.  I won't bump the threads relentlessly.

Here is what is left from Lot 190 in the recent SCP auction.  Smallish scans can be found here:

[url]https://catalog.scpauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=25208[/url]

These prices are based on recent sales from VCP and Card Target.  Whatever doesn't sell here will go on ebay with BIN-prices a little higher than these.  Payment by paypal (split the fees, please) or check or M.O. 

Please keep in mind that the cards will not be in my hands for 1-2 weeks. 

1909-11 T206 Johnson (Pitching) Sweet Caporal 350 ad back. VG w/name stamped on back.  400

9/1/10 The Sporting News Supplement Johnson/Street G-VG.
175

1914 B18 Baseball Blanket Johnson(Green Pennants) Nice condition but measures 5 3/16" by 5 3/16".
100

1921 Exhibits Johnson P SGC 10. Cracked holder.
120

1940 Play Ball #120 Johnson  NM PSA 7(OC)
125

1940 Play Ball #120 Johnson VG-EX.
100
